creator: michajlo_matijkiw@comcast.com
text:
Created attachment 26886
patch fixing bug

In apr_memcache_server_create, when apr_reslist_create fails (ie when apr_socket_timeout fails), server->conns is NULL and is passed to apr_reslist_cleanup_order_set, causing a segfault.

The attached patch fixes this issue.

creator: michajlo_matijkiw@comcast.com
text:
Created attachment 26888
use case exposing bug

Compile against apr trunk
fixed in r1183689, r1183736, r1183736, does not affect 1.3.x
creator: sf@sfritsch.de
